      • strands

        public java.util.ArrayList<StrandedArmature.Strand> strands
        Note: This code is doing a lot of stuff conceptually in relatively few lines of code and might be difficult to wrap your head around. I've opted to make it concise, because making it verbose did not make it any easier to digest. If you're going to edit it, you might want to take some time to graph things out.
